title: Indian Stocks Are Soaring After Tax Cuts. They’re Not Enough.
text:
India’s stocks rose again Monday, building on last week’s gains after the government’s surprise decision to slash corporate tax rates. But for those gains to persist, investors may need to see more reforms to bolster India’s struggling economy and to address its structural problems, including its vulnerable fiscal situation.

The iShares MSCI India ETF (INDA) is up 1.6%, building on the 5.7% gains on Friday. But year-to-date, the ETF is up just 0.5%, underperforming the iShares MSCI Emerging Markets ETF (EEM), which is up 7%...
description: India’s stocks rose again Monday, building on last week’s gains after the government’s surprise decision to slash corporate tax rates. But for those gains to persist, investors may need to see more reforms to bolster India’s struggling economy.
